import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import * as ACTIONS from '../../store/actions/index' import { memo, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import ModalItem from "./ModalItem"; function Modal( props ) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const [query, setQuery] = useState(''); const { orderHeader,handeOrderLine } = props const onChangeStatus = (event) => { var {value} = event.target console.log(value); // dispatch(ACTIONS.filerStatusOrderHeader(value)) } const onSearch = (event) => { setQuery(event.target.value) } useEffect(() => { dispatch(ACTIONS.filerSearchOrderHeader(query)) }, [query]); return ( <> {/* Modal */}

onSearch(event)} placeholder="Search......"/>
STT Mã kho Mã đơn hàng Khách hàng Trạng thái
{/* Modal */} ) } export default memo(Modal);
